latest_revision.text:
One of the most common uses for the lasers is to create boxes.  Now, you could design these all yourself in [[Inkscape]] or you could be efficient and lazy.  I recommend the latter.  You can also make parameterized boxes in Fusion360, as a tool to help learn fusion.  To do that you'll want to use one of the online box generators.  

= On-line box generator sites =
* [https://www.instructables.com/id/The-Ultimate-Guide-to-Laser-cut-Box-Generators/ Ultimate Guide Instructable]
* [https://en.makercase.com/#/ Simple box generator]
* [https://www.festi.info/boxes.py/ Online site that uses python to generate a bunch of interesting boxes]
* [https://www.templatemaker.nl/en/ Patterns for paper/cardboard boxes]

= Videos =
* [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n0mxwChyHGc Fusion 360 Tutorial â€“ Parametric Laser Cut Boxes]
